name: Flamechaser
description:
The Flamechasers are supposed to be inseparable. That's what Major Revelation taught the three of them - Tsubasa, Haneko, and Karahara. To be each other's wings, each other's eyes, and each other's shield.

<Do you know what the Flamechasers were picked for?>

Then Tsubasa stole the mysterious Phoenix Heart, and now Karahara must chase down the second coming of Major Revelation, with nothing but her most reliable wingmate Haneko and a promise on her shield.

<Is it really worth abandoning who you are, so you can chase someone else's half?>

Will she grasp that fleeting flame? Or will she find the torch that's always burning?

Or is there more than two ways to see the world?

Synopsis

A yuri visual novel about three gay mecha pilots and their mentors. Featuring hand drawn characters and original mecha designs, brace for a heart-pounding action romance as our heroines chase the flames!

From the perspective of Flamechaser-3, choose who to believe. Choose who to trust, and choose in who you believe. The pursuit of the flames hurt, and force you to give up possibilities. To choose one is to abandon another. At least, that's what Major Grace's long years says.

But youth has an advantage:

Youth doesn't recognize an elder's 'impossible'.

Written By: JO, DP, KS

Drawn By: Diurnal Days (twitter: @DiurnalDays) and Jess (twitter: @motorproteins)

Music By: AL, OS

Developed By: AK

Appropriate for all ages.

Features (current to 0.2 demo version)

Hand drawn characters

Original mecha designs

Decision structure

One complete scene, several text-only,  "two" pieces of music

Note: This demo version was extremely rushed! We put it together as a proof of concept more than anything - we're looking to put out a more complete demo by October 1st, 2022.

Eventual features:

Two to three routes lasting one to two hours each.

Unique dialogue and prose for each route.

Gallery system to look at the art of this game in closer detail.

Original soundtrack.
